QuestData.Title: For the Corn!
QuestData.Description: I've got a full summer's corn harvest just sittin' out in the field. I need some muscle to bring it in before the night elf raiders can destroy it.$B$BGet out there and bring me those crops, and I'll reward you handsomely.$B$BThe folks back in town need this food, and I sure as heck ain't eating rats for another winter.
QuestData.CompletionText: The corn isn't gonna gather itself.
QuestData.RewardText: All right, I'll get those barrels loaded up and delivered to the village in no time.$B$BThank you, $n. There'll be a lot of full bellies because of you.
